public abstract class Fauna
extends Organism

Superclass of Prey and Predator, contains methods that are acessible by both.

Method Detail

angleBetweenObjects

protected int angleBetweenObjects(Organism a,
                                  Organism b)
Finds the angle between two objects. Organism a is the organism that you are basing the angle off of (the "Origin")

Parameters:
a - the first organism, angle will be based off this one.
b - the 2nd organism.

distanceBetweenObjects

protected int distanceBetweenObjects(Organism a,
                                     Organism b)
finds the distance between two objects.

Parameters:
a - The first organism.
b - The 2nd organism.

getBabyValue

protected int getBabyValue(int female,
                           int male,
                           int mutationRateF,
                           int mutationRateM)
Averages the values of the male and female, and mutates it slightly based on mutation rates

Parameters:
female - The value of the female that you are trying to get for the baby
male - The value of them ale that you are trying to get for the baby
mutationRateF - The mutation rate of the female
mutationRateM - The mutation rate of the male
